Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Les Agassins in Le Pontet, you'll be close to Chateau de Fargues and Pont d'Avignon. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Eglise du Pontet and Rocher des Doms.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 26 air-conditioned rooms featuring fireplaces and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and minibars.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an outdoor pool, a seasonal outdoor pool, and bicycles to rent. This Tuscan-style hotel also features concierge services and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Les Agassins. Mingle with other guests at a complimentary reception, held daily. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the hotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and a meeting room. A train station pick-up service is available for a surcharge.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Les Agassins. Mingle with other guests at a complimentary reception, held daily. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the hotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Hotel Les Agassins in Le Pontet, you'll be close to Chateau de Fargues and Pont d'Avignon. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Eglise du Pontet and Rocher des Doms.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Chateau de Fargues - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Eglise du Pontet - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Rocher des Doms - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Avignon Cathedral - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Pont d'Avignon - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Palais des Papes - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Musee du Petit Palais - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Place de l'Horloge - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Grand Avignon Golf - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Collection Lambert - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Musee Calvet - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Fort St-Andre - 3.8 km / 2.3 mi
Tour Philippe le Bel - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Eglise Collegiale Notre-Dame - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Chartreuse du Val de Benediction - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi

The nearest airports are:
Avignon (XZN-Avignon TGV Train Station) - 6.2 km / 3.8 mi
Avignon (AVN-Caumont) - 7 km / 4.4 mi
Marseille (MRS-Marseille - Provence) - 64.6 km / 40.2 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Les Agassins is Marseille (MRS-Marseille - Provence).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
